column1: '''''The Old English Exodus''''' collects [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s text and translation of the [[Old English]] poem that is known as ''[[Wikipedia:Exodus (poem)
column2: Exodus]]''. They are accompanied by a commentary that has been produced by editing his notes for a series of informal lectures delivered to a specialist class in Oxford in the 1930s and 1940s.

column1: Although dated 1981, the book was actually published in January 1982. 3,000 copies were printed and it has not been reprinted.<ref>{{webcite
